s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - From a campaign management perspective, by automating the traditional 70-step campaign creation process, Brand+ and Performance+ reduce complexity and provide real-time reporting and AI-driven optimizations, enabling brands to stay competitive and drive better business results.

t: Amazon Puts Its Own “Brands” First Above Better-Rated Products – The Markup
s: An investigation by The Markup found that Amazon places products from its house brands and products exclusive to the site ahead of those from competitors—even competitors with higher customer ratings and more sales, judging from the volume of reviews.

t: Did You Know? Amazon Owns Scores of Private Label and Exclusive Brands - SellerEngine
s: January 6, 2023 - Here’s what you need to know about the Amazon Private Label project and the army of exclusive brands that joined it.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect your brand in Italy
s: Start your brand's Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you'll be able to unlock a suite of brand-building tools and obtain various protection benefits. You can enrol your brand even if you don't sell in an Amazon store.

t: Brand Tailored Promotions: Offer exclusive discounts for loyal customers - Sell on Amazon
s: August 1, 2023 - Amazon's new promotional tool helps sellers acquire new customers and build brand loyalty.

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: Amazon IP Accelerator connects you with a network of vetted legal service providers that offer trademark support and other intellectual-property services.
The Alexa brand’s primary color is Alexa Blue.

t: What is Amazon Exclusives? How Can You Succeed With This Program? - Empire Flippers
s: June 17, 2021 - Amazon Exclusives is a program that allows you to sell unique products on the Amazon platform while still being able to sell through your own e-commerce store outside of Amazon. Amazon will also promote your products for you and, if you join FBA, they will fulfil orders for you, too.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...
